title: Linneuniversitetet– Grotesk
content:
Any ideas on this one, especially the lower case ‘t’ ?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Lnu\_Wordmark.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018055322/http:/typophile.com/files/Lnu_Wordmark.jpg) | 28.36 KB |
author: Nikolaus

comments.content: What about [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018055322/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/) with a tight tracking? Just need to be replace /i squared dot by circles.

[http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018055322/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik")  
The 't' looks a little off maybe, but pretty close
